sentences.en: After the war, prisoners were repatriated.
Foreign investors are to be allowed to repatriate profits over one billion rupees.
sentences.cn: 外国投资者将被允许将利润额超过10亿卢比的部分调回国内。

sentences.en: How does a company remit its profits and dividends and repatriate capital abroad?
sentences.cn: 该怎样向国外汇寄其利润与股息和从国外汇回资本?

sentences.en: Party A shall repatriate the patient to Chinabear the cost of his passage to Guangzhou.
sentences.cn: 甲方应将病人遣返中国并负责其返回广州的旅费.

sentences.en: Suffering households and companies are more likely to repatriate overseas investments.
sentences.cn: 遭遇困难的家庭和企业更有可能撤回海外投资.

trans.tran_en: to send someone back to their own country

trans.tran_cn: 把（某人）遣送回国，遣返，回国
